page.title: 10INTERVIEW-SUPERINTENDANTcont
page.content: The main crime in our area is theft of and from vehicles.This is because of all the tourists.The Whitley Bay crime rate is average but is slowly increasing.This is happening all over Britain. The high pay and security against unemployment are the good things about policing.The job is also interesting and rewarding. The worst things about policing are the unsociable working hours,the fact that they must work under stress and the heavy amount of paperwork. Policing isn't as glamorous as some people think. The main highlight of the job is getting promoted.
